section.p: The template is used to record demographic information for a non-human study subject. The section includes that data which is not accommodated within the recordTarget structure.

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1177)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1178)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1179)/@code="DMGtbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1180)
Indicates that the contained information includes subject demographic data that is not acommodated by the record target participation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] strainAssociation (CONF:1181)
Information on the strain/substrain designation for the subject.
This strainAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1206)
This strainAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1207)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1208)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1211)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1209)/@code="SStbd" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1210)
The code value indicates theobservation records the appliable strain for the study subject.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1212), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Strain/Substrain Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1213)
Used to identify the vendor-supplied strain/substrain designation for the subject (i.e., test system) under study. When applicable, it combines the root strain, substrain, and associated genetic modifications as supplied by the vendor. It is extensible to accommodate strains not listed and genetically modified substrains. If this variable is excluded in the DM domain, the information must be present at a higher level (Trial Summary). [SEND: STRAIN]
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:1214)
A text description that provides additional details regarding the subject. [SEND: SUBTRAIN]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ageAssociation (CONF:1182)
Used to record the age of the subject.
This ageAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1191)
This ageAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1192)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1193)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1196)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1194)/@code="C25150" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1195)
The code value indicates this is an age observation.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:1197)
The recorded age of the study subject. Note, in some cases age will be available while date of birth is either not known or withheld. [SDTM: AGE, AGEU]

SHALL contain [2..2] entryRelationship (CONF:1183)
Information may be collected on both the Planned Study Arm, and the Actual Study Arm. The Planned Study Arm must be provided.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Arm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.81)

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] speciesAssociation (CONF:1184)
Information on the study species.
This speciesAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198)
This speciesAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1199)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1200)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1201)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1202)/@code="SPCtbd" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1203)
The code value indicates this is an age observation.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1204), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Species Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1205)
The species of the subject. If no value is present, it must be provided within the trial summary. [SEND: SPECIES]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1185)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1186)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1187)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1188)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1189)
Provides information on the reference period that has been defined for the subject's participation in the study.
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reference Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] setMembershipAssociation (CONF:1190)
A record of the trial set that the subject has been assigned to.
This setMembershipAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1215)
This setMembershipAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1216)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1217)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1220)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1218)/@code="TBD" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1219)
The code value indicates this is a set membership observation.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1221)
A code that identifies the trial set the subject has been assigned to. The list of valid trial sets is submitted as part of study design. [SEND: SETCD]
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="ACT" Act (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1177)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1178)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1179)/@code="DMGtbd" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1180)
Indicates that the contained information includes subject demographic data that is not acommodated by the record target participation.

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] strainAssociation (CONF:1181)
Information on the strain/substrain designation for the subject.
This strainAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1206)
This strainAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1207)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1208)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1211)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1209)/@code="SStbd" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1210)
The code value indicates theobservation records the appliable strain for the study subject.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1212), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Strain/Substrain Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1213)
Used to identify the vendor-supplied strain/substrain designation for the subject (i.e., test system) under study. When applicable, it combines the root strain, substrain, and associated genetic modifications as supplied by the vendor. It is extensible to accommodate strains not listed and genetically modified substrains. If this variable is excluded in the DM domain, the information must be present at a higher level (Trial Summary). [SEND: STRAIN]
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] text (CONF:1214)
A text description that provides additional details regarding the subject. [SEND: SUBTRAIN]

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] ageAssociation (CONF:1182)
Used to record the age of the subject.
This ageAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1191)
This ageAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1192)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1193)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1196)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1194)/@code="C25150" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1195)
The code value indicates this is an age observation.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type PQ (CONF:1197)
The recorded age of the study subject. Note, in some cases age will be available while date of birth is either not known or withheld. [SDTM: AGE, AGEU]

SHALL contain [2..2] entryRelationship (CONF:1183)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Study Arm (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.81)
Information may be collected on both the Planned Study Arm, and the Actual Study Arm. The Planned Study Arm must be provided.

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] speciesAssociation (CONF:1184)
Information on the study species.
This speciesAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="COMP" (CONF:1198)
This speciesAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1199)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1200)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1201)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1202)/@code="SPCtbd" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1203)
The code value indicates this is an age observation.
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:1204), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet Species Type CXXXXX STATIC (CONF:1205)
The species of the subject. If no value is present, it must be provided within the trial summary. [SEND: SPECIES]

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1185)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Comment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23)
A place to insert comments related to a particular finding.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1186)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Domain Assignment (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30)
Identifies the SDTM or SEND domain the record is assigned to.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1187)
Contains @typeCode="REFR" REFR
Contains exactly one [1..1] Related Record (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75)
Establishes a relationship between this record and another record.

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship (CONF:1188)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Supplemental Value (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96)
Allows the association of a supplemental value - outside of the content specfied for the domain - to the record.

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entryRelationship (CONF:1189)
Contains @typeCode="COMP" COMP
Contains exactly one [1..1] Reference Period (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.73)
Provides information on the reference period that has been defined for the subject's participation in the study.

This setMembershipAssociation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation (CONF:1216)

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1220)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1218)/@code="TBD" Reported Age (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1 NCI Thesaurus) (CONF:1219)

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <act xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <id root="201894077" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="2100345572"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <entryRelationship> <act> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.81"/> <id root="7226840" extension="MDHT"/> <code codeSystem="locally defined" codeSystemName="Study Arm Type"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.23"/> <id root="511049579" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="C49569" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <participant/> <entryRelationship/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.30"/> <id root="742857270" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="C66734" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <act classCode="ACT"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.75"/> <id root="751796466" extension="MDHT"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.3.26.1.1" codeSystemName="NCI Thesaurus"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.23.96"/> <id root="440040563" extension="MDHT"/> <code codeSystem="locally defined" codeSystemName="Supplemental Value Type"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> <participant/> <entryRelationship typeCode="COMP"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <act> <id root="1643852286" extension="MDHT"/> <code code="419280805"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2012"/> <high value="2012"/> </effectiveTime> </act> </entryRelationship> </act>
